output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: No visible CMF number, but this doesn't automatically disqualify it as propaganda.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "George Simion" who is a presidential candidate (Position 2 on the ballot).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Promotes a public march - Uses hashtags to reach wider audience - Estimated to reach 500,001-1,000,000 people - Already has 5,000-5,999 impressions
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Uses hashtag #georgesimionpresedinte - Promotes a march specifically in support of George Simion - Uses multiple electoral hashtags (#alegeri2024 #alegeri) - Clear campaign activity
5. Journalism: No - This is not journalistic content - It's an announcement/promotion of a political event - Contains campaign-specific hashtags and messaging
6. Personal opinion: No - This is an organized campaign activity - Paid advertisement - Structured as a campaign announcement

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This clearly constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Explicitly promotes a presidential candidate - Is a paid advertisement reaching a large audience - Uses campaign-specific messaging and hashtags - Promotes a campaign event - Is running after the end of the presidential campaign period
conclusion.message-for-police: SC VIDEO DANCRYS-STUDIO SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propaganda electorala pentru candidatul GEORGE-NICOLAE SIMION dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala. Materialul, cu ID-ul 584647100592642 pe Facebook, promoveaza un mars de sustinere pentru candidat, foloseste hashtag-uri electorale (#georgesimionpresedinte) si are un obiectiv electoral clar, fiind difuzat dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea este sponsorizata si are un impact estimat intre 500,001 si 1,000,000 de persoane, demonstrand intentia clara de a influenta alegatorii in perioada in care propaganda electorala este interzisa prin lege.
